title: Cereal bars
ingredients: ['2 tbsp sunflower seeds', '2 tbsp pumpkin seeds', '2 tbsp linseeds', '2 bananas, about 300 g (10½ oz) in total, weighed with their skins on', '100 g (3½ oz) unsalted butter', '3 tbsp honey or maple syrup (or golden syrup)', '50 g (1¾ oz) millet flakes', '100 g (3½ oz) rolled oats', '100 g (3½ oz) stoned dried dates, roughly chopped']
